name: Micromanagement Overload
description:
Micromanagement Overload

Manage your drones to do their jobs of carrying the production crates around the factory. Drones are great; unlike human workers, they are simple, reliable, non-complaining, and free. Only downside is that they need to be told exactly what to do, and you as their boss need to manage them, ensuring that the correct crates are carried where they are supposed to, without screwing anything up.

This is my first "completed" game, and first time using Godot. Been using the VimJam 2 as an excuse to actually develop something, with a semi-realistic goal of finishing with the limited time available for development.
